snippet: The lack of a single tax authority governing all 27 members of the European Union has long allowed the country to make tax affairs more opaque than other members.
abstract: Austria faces renewed pressure to reveal more about tax evaders after European Union calls for automatic information sharing to apply more widely and rapidly within bloc; lack of single tax authority has long allowed country to make tax affairs more opaque than other members.
lead_paragraph: The lack of a single tax authority governing all 27 members of the European Union has long allowed the country to make tax affairs more opaque than other members.

headline.main: Austria Is Pressured to Reveal More About Tax Evaders
